action_profiles_extension_disabled.message: The extension is disabled and your headers will not be updated. Click the button above to enable the extension.

error_domains_required.message: At least one domain is required

error_headers_required.message: At least one header is required

form_name_help.message: Provide a name to easily distinguish this profile from others.

form_value_help.message: Multiple IP addresses can be separated with a space.

form_headers_help.message: Select one or more headers to update.

form_domains_help.message: Provide a space-delimited or comma-delimited list of domains to either include or exclude. Domains will also match all subdomains (e.g., 'github.com' will match 'www.github.com' and 'example.github.com'). Note that these are the request domains, which may differ from the URL you see in the URL bar.

profile_for_domains_excluded.message: For all domains except the following

profile_page_title.message: Edit Profiles for the X-Forwarded-For Extension

profile_extension_disabled.message: The extension is disabled and your headers will not be updated.

confirm_delete_message.message: Are you sure to delete [$name$] Profiles?
